snippet: Determined to continue in show jumping competitions, Georgina Bloomberg, daughter of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York City, has come back from multiple injuries and spinal surgery.
abstract: Georgina Bloomberg, daughter of New York Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, has come back from multiple injuries and spinal surgery, determined to continue in show jumping competitions.
lead_paragraph: Determined to continue in show jumping competitions, Georgina Bloomberg, daughter of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York City, has come back from multiple injuries and spinal surgery.

headline.seo: Bloomberg’s Daughter Georgina Is Back in Show Jumping Saddle
headline.main: As a Catalog of Pain Shows, She Isn’t Riding Just for Show
headline.print_headline: As a Catalog of Pain Shows, She Isn’t Riding Just for Show
